delete from tbl_fault_shield where v_fault_shield_id in

mapper.select: SELECT definition.fault_type, definition.fault_name, shield.v_elevator_id as elevator_id, shield.v_elevator_code as elevator_code, shield.i_is_user_visible as user_visible, shield.i_is_report as is_report, IFNULL(shield.i_is_user_visible, "1") as is_shield FROM tbl_fault_definition_0902 definition LEFT JOIN tbl_fault_shield shield ON definition.fault_type = shield.i_fault_type AND shield.v_elevator_code = #{elevatorCode} WHERE definition.platform_type = #{eventType} AND definition.elevator_type = #{elevatorType} ORDER BY definition.fault_type + 0
